about: Creative full-stack engineer specializing in the creation of custom IT solutions for web and mobile with 7+ years of experience. I have worked on a variety of projects at companies of all sizes and been an important problem solver in the teams and has never failed to deliver quality work with his hard work and problem-solving skills.  Always offer high-quality web and mobile development and design service, providing customized solutions that best fit the unique need of client's business. Care about user-friendliness and the performance of the application.
